channel.title: The music of Don Gillis III
channel.description:
This series spotlights the works of American composer Don Gillis and is hosted by the man himself.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

image.title: The music of Don Gillis III

item.title: Program 16
item.description: This program features "Four Scenes from Yesterday;" "Woodwind Quintet No. 2;" "and Encore Concerto."
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: NAEB Region V: Lower Midwest/Central South
